statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_information ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT id, name, encrypted_address FROM customer_information ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_information WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM customer_information WHERE encrypted_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, encrypted_data FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id WHERE customers.name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT name, total_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount IS NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, address_line1, city FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, addresses.address_line1 FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id WHERE addresses.city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_total, customers.customer_name, addresses.city, addresses.country FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id WHERE orders.order_total BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY orders.order_total DESC, customers.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_address, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, city, state FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_amount FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT payment_date, payment_amount, customer_name FROM payments JOIN orders ON payments.order_id = orders.order_id JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM customer_information;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM order_information WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, communication_date, communication_method FROM communication_history ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 3;

SELECT ci.customer_name, ai.city, pi.card_number, oi.total_amount FROM customer_information ci JOIN address_information ai ON ci.customer_id = ai.customer_id JOIN payment_information pi ON ci.customer_id = pi.customer_id JOIN order_information oi ON ci.customer_id = oi.customer_id WHERE oi.total_amount > 1000;

SELECT ci.customer_name, ch.communication_date, ch.communication_method FROM customer_information ci LEFT JOIN communication_history ch ON ci.customer_id = ch.customer_id WHERE ch.communication_method = 'Email';

SELECT ci.customer_name, ai.city, pi.card_number, oi.total_amount FROM customer_information ci JOIN address_information ai ON ci.customer_id = ai.customer_id JOIN payment_information pi ON ci.customer_id = pi.customer_id JOIN order_information oi ON ci.customer_id = oi.customer_id WHERE ci.customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
